channel.title: Chronic-X Hurry And Be Apart Of The Team!
channel.description:
[center]you will get access to this :)[/center]
[center][img]http://chronic-x.com/Pics/vps.PNG[/img][/center]
[center][size=15pt][font=impact]Skills[/font][/size][/center] [center] [center][Melee] [code]-All Correct attacking Animations for ALL weapons we are using -All running,standing,walking animations -Reasonable Hit forumla and correct weapon stats -Melee Fading Hitmarker[code]
[Magic] [code]-Normal Book with Correct Animations & Graphics for projectiles, Most if not all working spells -All correct special attacks -Lunar Book with correct Animations & Graphics with most if not all working spells -Ancients Book with Correct Animations & Graphics for projectiles with most or close to all working spells -Working Staffs with autocast on the correct ones, walking,standing,running animations -Autocast option via right click -Magic Fading Hitmarker[/code]
[Range] [code]-Nearly All working Bows with correct Arrows in them -All the correct special attacks -Correct Running,walking,standing anims -Correct Projectiles,anims,gfx.... -Ranged fading Hitmarker[/code]
[Known Bugs] [code]-None Atm [Bugs Fixed] -None Atm[/code][/center]
[center] [Prayer] [code]-All Correct Draining, reqs ect.. For both normal and curses -Curses with correct projectiles graphics and animations and timers -Quick Prayers -Quick Curses
[Known Bugs] -None Atm [Bugs Fixed] -None Atm[/code][/center]
[center][Pictures Time!][/center]
[center] [img]http://chronic-x.com/Pics/1.PNG[/img] [img]http://chronic-x.com/Pics/15.PNG[/img] [img]http://chronic-x.com/Pics/16.PNG[/img] [img]http://chronic-x.com/Pics/17.PNG[/img] [img]http://chronic-x.com/Pics/18.PNG[/img] [img]http://chronic-x.com/Pics/19.PNG[/img] [img]http://chronic-x.com/Pics/7.PNG[/img] [img]http://chronic-x.com/Pics/8.PNG[/img] [img]http://chronic-x.com/Pics/9.PNG[/img] [img]http://chronic-x.com/Pics/10.PNG[/img] [img]http://chronic-x.com/Pics/11.PNG[/img] [img]http://chronic-x.com/Pics/12.PNG[/img] [img]http://chronic-x.com/Pics/13.PNG[/img] [img]http://chronic-x.com/Pics/14.PNG[/img][/center]
[center]More Media Soon![/center]

item.title: Chronic-X Hurry And Be Apart Of The Team!
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Mystic-Effect, post:8, topic:439505”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=542198.msg3972845#msg3972845 date=1334332738]
renamed doesnt mean its not leeched. renaming code means you renamed a method and renamed the method calling the renamed method. orusocool. I would support if it wasn’t leeched this much.
[/quote]
This is constructive criticism. Renaming things doesn nothing but renaming. Efficiency is not effected so you got nowhere doing that.

again kid just get off my thread i dont care if u support or not ive spent time renaming things becuase i dont like the way half of it is wrote so just get off its not leeched and ive also spent time fixing all the glitches.[/quote]

Read full topic

Just like u riipiin i dont care what u say i honestly dont but u cant say its a leech becuase if u read through most of the code its all renamed so get off my thread.
